description:
The easiest plugin to integrate Stripe payment system into your app. 

Uses 1 Action only, simply input your Stripe Key, product datails and you're done!

See our interactive demo
name: Easy Stripe Payments
plugin_instructions:
Requirements:
- Stripe Account
- Stripe API Key

Proceeding:
Follow the tutorial on the demo page to insert information into the action form
